title: IoT Core to DynamoDB using CDK and Kotlin
description: Create an DynamoDBv2 IoT rule action to ingest data over AWS IoT core and publish to Amazon DynamoDB table.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern uses the DynamoDBv2 action to write all or parts of an MQTT message to an Amazon DynamoDB table.
Each attribute in the payload is written to a separate column in the DynamoDB table.
This pattern deploys one DynamoDB table, one IoT Rule.
